title: Kiss the Darkness: A forbidden Love that could save them all...
description: A medieval Kingdom divided. Two great races at war. One the humans who seek to rule the land, the other, demons who wish to walk in the light once more. Two young men come together and find love but the crimes of the past threaten to keep them apart. A story of romance, magic, mystery, and true love. Can the love between these two bring peace back to the Kingdom or will the hate and sins of the past spill over into their world?
author: Chance McGinnis
